items.sentence: I think Mary wants me to kiss her, but I\'m not sure.
I think Tom doesn\'t have the courage to oppose Mary.
They found a secluded beach where they spent the day.
They stopped talking as soon as I came into the room.
Tom\'s opinions don\'t carry much weight around here.
Everyone\'s waiting nervously to see what\'ll happen.
A house without books is like a room without windows.
A winter sport that many people enjoy is ice skating.
All I want to do is close my eyes and get some sleep.
It was difficult for Tom to convince Mary to do that.
